name: The Legend of Belda
description:
Will the hero of the prophecy help the village?

CONTROLS:

KEYBOARD:
- Move: WASD or Arrows
- Interact / validate: E / Space / Enter
- Attack: F (keep the key pressed and release it for a spin attack)
- Secondary item: G
- Carry: C
- Inventory menu: I / Escape 

(Keyboards other than QWERTY have their keys mapped to the same location, ex: ZQSD on AZERTY keyboards to move.)

GAMEPADS:
- Move: Left joystick or arrows [NOTE: Some controller may have their joystick Y axis inverted due to a Unity known issue]
- Interact / validate: South button (ex: X for PS controller)
- Attack: West button (keep the button pressed and release it for a spin attack)
- Secondary item: North button
- Carry: East button
- Inventory menu: Start button
